Name: Master of Puppets
About the game: Master of Puppet is a turn based strategy boardgame with resource management and a deck building mechanic. Each turn, cards are played to build and upgrade a squad of Mechs. The Mechs can be moved around on the board to protect strategic locations, gather resources, find treasure and, most importantly, attack enemies. Master of Puppets has an infinite number of procedurally generated campaigns. Each campaign has 3 planets of 12, 18 and 24 maps to a total of 54 maps per campaign. As you unlock each location you will be able to collect more cards. 54 maps of increasing difficulty for each campaign. 86 different cards. 4 mission objectives. Fuse, forge and upgrade cards to build you custom deck. Endless number of procedurally generated campaigns.
